infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Around Me Now needs access to your location to show you nearby events and provide location-based recommendations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Around Me Now needs access to your location to show you nearby events, provide location-based recommendations, and send you notifications when you're near events.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Around Me Now needs access to your location to show you nearby events, provide location-based recommendations, and send you notifications when you're near events.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Around Me Now needs access to your calendar to sync events and add them to your schedule.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Around Me Now needs full access to your calendar to sync events and add them to your schedule.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Around Me Now to use your location to find events near you.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow Around Me Now to access your calendar to sync events and add them to your schedule.
